Criteria: From the US-YR sheets - Carbon dioxide – cell K3 – U.S. annual CO2 emissions (tons) – USCO2AN; Methane – cell L3 – U.S. annual CH4 emissions (lbs) – USCH4AN; Electricity – cell F3 – U.S. annual net generation (MWh) – USNGENAN; Nitrous oxide – cell M3 – U.S. annual N2O emissions (lbs) – USN2OAN;Heat – cell D3 – U.S. total annual heat input (MMBtu) – USHTIANT; Sulfur dioxide – cell J3 – U.S. annual SO2 emissions (tons) – USSO2AN; Nitrogen oxides – cell H3 – U.S. annual NOx emissions (tons) – USNOXAN; From the PLNTYR sheet - Steam - sum column AD - CHP plant useful thermal output (MMBtu) – USETHRMO
